title: Cognitive Load Management-Based Language Learning Optimization Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Enhanced workplace-context language learning for professionals, with personalized cognitive load management through individual learning pattern analysis

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain extrinsic/intrinsic cognitive load occurring during language learning with over 80% accuracy
Learners can present scenarios where three or more cognitive load management techniques (e.g., chunking, visualization) are applicable when designing learning tasks
Learners can adjust personalized learning plans with over 70% efficiency by analyzing module-specific cognitive load metrics provided in the LMS
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
